amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities of the Second Class and Villages
amendatorysection.para: A second-class city shall have power to regulate and prevent storage of gunpowder, tar, pitch, resin, coal oil, benzine, turpentine, hemp, cotton, nitroglycerine, petroleum or any of the productions thereof and other material, and the use of lights in stables and shops and other places, and the building of bonfires. It may regulate, prohibit and restrain the use of fireworks, firecrackers, Roman candles, sky rockets, and other pyrotechnic displays.
